ygData.subject: Re: Heretics of Erudin
ygData.msgSnippet: They are guildmasters im sorry and shop for erudin necros. But forest is full of necros to kill ther is one heretic necromancer wich is connected with a quest
ygData.messageBody:
They are guildmasters im sorry and shop for erudin necros.
But forest is full of necros to kill ther is one heretic necromancer wich
is connected with a quest in erudin cc 15 lv i think. Also here is one
realy high necro near skeleton mines zone border but he is better leave in
pace, also you can kill a necro near boat to kera isle and also on kera
isle is a hideout of some heretic necros wich you can kill on your lv
without too much problems i think that higest is lv 24 but im not shure on
this he is in summoning pit and i like to hit him hard realy hard do it in
my neme if you pass by




At 14.03 26/05/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Ken Lee" <kenlee@...>
>
>Basically I'd like to know, what level are those heretics in the hut on the
>Erudin entrance side of the Toxxulia forest? As well, how many of them are
>there? I went there around 5-6th level and was immediately slaughtered. I'd
>like to go back and administer some chastisement, but what are they? If
>they're guidmaster/teacher stuff then there's no way. However, if they're
>just a bunch of NPCs meant to be killed, then....heh heh heh...
>
>" I dance and spin and all have fun, for my prince's sake I am undone... "
>- Zalbar The Mad; said to a befuddled 12th lvl halfling rogue
>
>Zalbar The Mad
>20th Wizard
>Solusek Ro
